name: Google Cloud SCC
description: This plugin is used to ingest alerts and events data to Google Cloud SCC. The plugin supports sharing of findings data. The plugin requires credentials for a GCP service account to function.

configuration.label: Organization ID
configuration.description: Organization ID of GCP in which data will be ingested.

configuration.label: Source ID
configuration.description: Source ID of GCP in which data will be ingested.

configuration.label: Key File
configuration.description: Service Account Key file of GCP.
